original_text:
but this one was made a priest with an oath by the one who said to him:
“The Lord has sworn
    and will not change his mind,
‘You are a priest forever.’”
korean_text: (그들은 맹세 없이 제사장이 되었으되 오직 예수는 자기에게 말씀하신 이로 말미암아 맹세로 되신 것이라 주께서 맹세하시고 뉘우치지 아니하시리니 네가 영원히 제사장이라 하셨도다)

sentences.original_text: but this one was made a priest with an oath
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 이 사람은 맹세로 제사장이 되었고

sentences.original_text: by the one who said to him:
and will not change his mind,
